item.title: Shawn Mendes - Señorita - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: Am, Cmaj7, F, Em, G
As performed by Shawn Mendes and Camila Cabello
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/-ADxekOsPqA
Want the intro TAB in PDF format? Visit: https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/2019/06/22/tab-for-senorita/
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion background is from motionbolt.com. The "clean" version of the song (use in schools may still not be appropriate) is from Polar Records (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FjC5XHyK7hE)
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Shawn Mendes - If I Can't Have You - Key of G
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play If I Can’t Have You on the ukulele by Shawn Mendes. The chords used are G Em7 F#m Bm7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Shawn Mendes - Stitches - Key of C
Shawn Mendes - Stitches - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along of Stitches by Shawn Mendes - Am G C F (original song transposed down half step to fit ukulele)
The part just before the chorus has slightly different chords... watch the video carefully! Can be played with D-U-U-U-U strumming or following the finger picking guide. This is a decent song for beginners to practice figuring out tab and finger picking, but speed is the main issue.
Lyric video from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=84KeXnZ5KZk
